title: (x) Looking for Obbsidda - Kasse FLF (VGC Modula) {Mike F}
content:
Hey everyone. I’m new to these boards, so let me take a moment to say hi. :)

I’m having a devil of a time tracking down a font called Obbsidda. I did find a post on these forums from a couple of years back on it, but nothing else. I’m guessing it used to go by the name Modular Bold, but the font that comes up by that name in Google searches bears no resemblence. It was owned by NovelFonts.

Does anyone know where I can get a copy of this font these days? Or even a relatively decent proxy?

Thanks in advance,  
Tom

 [‹ Need id help in two fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20080107113226/http:/typophile.com/node/18610 "Go to previous forum topic") [Sutera Medical Spa logo ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080107113226/http:/typophile.com/node/18612 "Go to next forum topic")
author: BluSponge

comments.content: This was NovelFonts’ version of the (predigital) VGC typeface Modula Bold. The only digital version of this weight that I know of was created by the now defunct Casady & Greene. They called it [Kasse FLF Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20080107113226/http:/www.moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/casady_greene/j_p.htm) (there are three weights in the download).

Thanks, Mike. This will probably work in a pinch, though I’m still hoping to find a copy of the actual font, even if its part of some huge compilation.

Tom
